short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Like button on steroids - automate likes in Tinder™, Mamba™ and other services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions automates the swiping for you on Tinder and Mamba platforms. Open the page and start the extension. You can stop anytime by clicking somewhere on the page.
